TopicTitle: Ship icon disappeared in Orbit Map mode

Articles.Content: Part way through going into orbit, the icon showing where my ship was in Orbit Map suddenly disappeared. I restarted the game but that didn't help, and neither did reinstalling (over the existing version but replacing files). Anyone else had this or can help? Am running 1.0.5.1028.
Hi @JMS1959, mouse over the top edge of the map to see the filters, or use the tracking station, and enable all the filters so your craft is visible.
That solved it, thank you sal_vager
